Description.Text: The Toyoko Inn Nagoya Sakae is a hotel. Located in Nagoya area..

The hotel is situated within 6 minutes' walk of the no.1 exit of Shin Sakaemachi station on the Higashiyama metro line and 10 minutes' walk from exit no.3 of Takaoka station on the Sakura-Dori metro line. Facilities The hotel offers wireless internet access, a restaurant and a newspaper stand. Rooms The accommodation units each feature a double bed. Features include a safe, a fridge and internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a bathtub and a hairdryer. Copyright GIATA 2004 - 2015. Multilingual, powered by www.giata.com for client no. 124988 Meals B & B is bookable as a board option. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard.
